faq.q_cost: How much does an inspection cost?
faq.a_cost: The minimum fee is 50,000 HUF + travel costs (Buda: 10,000 HUF). The exact price is determined by the size of the property and the complexity of the network.
faq.a_card: Yes, card payment is available on-site.
faq.a_invoice_individual: Yes, I issue VAT-free invoices to private individuals on-site.
faq.q_pest: Do you also work in Pest?
faq.a_pest: Exceptionally yes, with a 20,000 HUF travel fee. My main service area is the Buda side of Budapest.
faq.q_assembly: Does the general assembly need to decide on the inspection?
faq.a_assembly: Usually yes. That's why I provide a detailed quote that can be presented at the general assembly for decision-making.
faq.q_error: What happens if you find an error?
faq.a_error: I document it in the report and make suggestions for repair. I can also perform the repair based on a separate quote.
faq.a_invoice_condo: I issue VAT-free invoices to condominiums.
faq.q_outside_buda: Do you also take on condominium work outside of Buda?
faq.a_outside_buda: My main area is Buda. I exceptionally take on work in Pest with a 20,000 HUF travel fee.
faq.q_vat_invoice: Will I receive a VAT invoice?
faq.a_vat_invoice: Yes, I issue VAT invoices to businesses.
